nodes.short_description: Verwandle dein Zuhause mit Living Room in ein gemütliches Wildtierreservat! Mache deine Möbel zu lebhaften Inseln, kümmere dich um niedliche Tiere, züchte einzigartige Farbvarianten und gestalte deinen Raum mit bunten Dekorationen. Schließe Quests ab, um im Normalen Modus neue Biome freizuschalten, löse Rätsel im Herausforderungsmodus oder entspanne und dekoriere im Kreativmodus. Du kannst sogar dein Lieblingstier in ein lebensgroßes Haustier verwandeln! Jetzt erhältlich für Quest 2, 3 & 3S.

Transform your home into a cozy wildlife sanctuary with Living Room! Turn your furniture into vibrant islands, care for cute critters, breed unique color variants and customize your entire space with colorful decorations. Complete quests to unlock new biomes in Normal Mode, solve tricky puzzles in Challenge Mode, or relax and decorate in Creative Mode. You can even turn your favorite animal into a life-sized pet! Available now on Quest 2, Quest 3, and Quest 3S.

Transformez votre maison en un sanctuaire animalier cosy avec Living Room ! Métamorphosez vos meubles en îles animées, prenez soin de créatures mignonnes et personnalisez votre espace avec des décorations colorées. Accomplissez des quêtes pour débloquer de nouveaux biomes en mode normal, résolvez des énigmes en mode défi ou jouez-la cool et décoratif en mode créatif. Transformez votre animal préféré en mascotte grandeur nature ! Disponible dès maintenant sur Quest 2, 3 et 3S.

거실을 아늑한 야생 동물 보호구역으로 만들어보세요! 가구를 생동감 넘치는 섬으로 만들어 꾸미고, 귀여운 동물들을 돌보며, 독특한 색 변종을 번식시키고 다채로운 장식으로 공간을 커스터마이즈하세요. 일반 모드에서 퀘스트를 완료해 새로운 생태계를 열고, 도전 모드에서 퍼즐을 풀거나 창의 모드에서 자유롭게 꾸미며 힐링하세요. 좋아하는 동물을 실제 크기의 반려동물로 만들 수도 있어요! 지금 Quest 2, Quest 3, Quest 3S에서 만나보세요.

¡Transforma tu hogar en un acogedor santuario de vida salvaje con Living Room! Convierte tus muebles en islas vibrantes, cuida hermosas criaturas, cria variantes de color únicas ypersonaliza tu espacio a placer. Completa misiones para desbloquear nuevos biomas en el Modo Normal, resuelve rompecabezas desafiantes en el Modo Desafío, o relájate y decora en el Modo Creativo. ¡Incluso puedes transformar tu animal favorito en una mascota tamaño real! Disponible en Quest 2, Quest 3 y Quest 3S.

keywords: ファミリー向けゲーム
バーチャルペットゲーム
動物シミュレーション
nodes.short_description: Living Roomで、あなたの家をアットホームな野生動物保護区に変えましょう！家具を鮮やかな島に変え、かわいいクリーチャーを育て、ユニークな色のバリエーションを繁殖し、カラフルな装飾で空間をカスタマイズ。ノーマルモードで新しいバイオームをアンロックし、チャレンジモードで難しいパズルを解いたり、クリエイティブモードでリラックスして装飾したりできます。好きな動物を実物大のペットにもできます！Quest 2、Quest 3、Quest 3Sで利用可能。

¡Transforma tu hogar en un acogedor santuario de vida salvaje con Living Room! Convierte tus muebles en islas vibrantes, cuida hermosas criaturas, cria variantes de color únicas ypersonaliza tu espacio a placer. Completa misiones para desbloquear nuevos biomas en el Modo Normal, resuelve rompecabezas desafiantes en el Modo Desafío, o relájate y decora en el Modo Creativo. ¡Incluso puedes transformar tu animal favorito en una mascota tamaño real! Disponible en Quest 2, Quest 3 y Quest 3S.

Transform your home into a cosy wildlife sanctuary with Living Room! Turn your furniture into vibrant islands, care for cute critters, breed unique colour variants and customise your entire space with colourful decorations. Complete quests to unlock new biomes in Normal Mode, solve tricky puzzles in Challenge Mode, or relax and decorate in Creative Mode. You can even turn your favourite animal into a life-sized pet! Available now on Quest 2, Quest 3, and Quest 3S.

nodes.long_description:
# A Wildlife Sanctuary Inside Your Room

Transform your space into your very own dynamic ecosystem in Living Room - a wholesome and quirky mixed reality simulation game!

Turn your furniture into islands and populate them with a variety of derpy animals and lush plants. Observe as your room comes alive with colorful wildlife, and enjoy the whimsical experience of managing and expanding your digital sanctuary.

# Mixed Reality Magic

Seamlessly blend the digital and physical world as your room transforms into a vibrant nature reserve. Paint islands on your furniture for your creatures to live on, rearrange them in your space, and watch as your chosen explorer pet roams and explores your room in real-time.

Unlock decorations for your room, and witness the change in lighting as you switch between day- and nighttime.

# Care for Your Wildlife

Ensure the needs of all your species are met to maintain balance. Watch your animals grow, build them shelters for the night, and breeding grounds to expand their populations, featuring a kaleidoscope of colorful variants.

# Unlock New Species and Biomes

Unlock new biomes as you progress, each with its own unique species of flora and fauna, and introduce them to your ecosystem.

# Casual Yet Challenging

Relax as you watch your wildlife thrive in Normal Mode, test your knowledge and skill with challenging puzzles and tricky scenarios in Challenge Mode, or freely design the most dreamy and picturesque sanctuaries in Creative Mode.
